Nigella Mix Capsule
619,54
Product Code:8682368236134
- +

• It is a food supplement consisting of a mixture of nigella oil, fig seed oil, pomegranate seed oil, grape seed oil and apricot seed oil.

Warnings :

• Food supplements do not replace nutrition. It is not a medicine, it is not used to treat diseases.
